timeline.message: Chore: Clean up formatting and remove unused field
Feat(Job): Create utility for converting DB model to rest model for jobs
Feat(Job): Update non-read methods in JobConfigActions to use new job accessor
Feat(Job): Update create method in JobConfigActions to use new job accessor
Feat(Job): Update the update method in JobConfigActions to use new job accessor
Fix(Job): Add missing fields to accessor and update integration tests

timeline.bodyText: Why is this no longer needed?
timeline.author: JakeMathews

replies.bodyText: The method JobConfigActions.convertJobDatabaseModelToRestModel(...), the method that threw the exception this test was for, is no longer used in JobConfigActions.validateJobsById(...). So there is no longer a need to test exception handling as there is none.
replies.author: gkillough

timeline.bodyText: It might be better to have this listed closer to where it's actually used
timeline.author: bamandel

timeline.bodyText: Are all of these constants no longer available in this package? Using the same constants would cut down on any potential misspellings.
timeline.author: bamandel

replies.bodyText: Ugh lol. I stole a lot of this from the DB util which didn't have access to these field constants. I'll fix it.
replies.author: gkillough

timeline.bodyText: Do we want to make util classes final? I don't see any reason why we'd want someone extending this.
timeline.author: bamandel
